name: 艾伦·霍奇金
bio_short: 英国生理学家和生物物理学家。他与安德鲁·赫胥黎（Andrew Huxley）合作，建立了“霍奇金-赫胥黎模型”，揭示了神经冲动（动作电位）是“离子通道”中钠和钾离子流动的结果，并因此获得了1963年的诺贝尔奖。
bio_short_en: A British physiologist and biophysicist. He and Andrew Huxley created the 'Hodgkin-Huxley model', which explained the nerve impulse (action potential) as the result of sodium and potassium ion flows through 'ion channels'. He won the 1963 Nobel Prize for this work.
